name: bootstrap-tooltip-custom-class
description: Extends Bootstrap Tooltip plugin by adding custom classes.
extraDescription:
Custom classes can be added by using `customClass` parameter or via `data-custom-class` attribute.
There are 5 predefined custom classes in CSS: .tooltip-primary, .tooltip-success, .tooltip-info, .tooltip-warning, .tooltip-danger.

scripts.install-v3: cd bootstrap-v3 && rm -rf node_modules && npm install
scripts.install-v4: cd bootstrap-v4 && rm -rf node_modules && npm install
scripts.install-v4-alpha: cd bootstrap-v4-alpha && rm -rf node_modules && npm install
scripts.install-all: npm run install-v3 && npm run install-v4 && npm run install-v4-alpha
scripts.build-all: npm run build-v3 && npm run build-v4 && npm run build-v4-alpha
scripts.version-all: npm run version-v3 && npm run version-v4 && npm run version-v4-alpha
